body.string: {"model":"meta-llama/Llama-3.3-70B-Instruct-Turbo","max_tokens":128.0,"temperature":0.0,"messages":[{"role":"system","content":"You are a helpfull assistant who answers questions succinctly."},{"role":"user","content":"Where am I located?"},{"role":"assistant","tool_calls":[{"id":"MpfiuoRaM","type":"function","function":{"name":"get_location","arguments":"{}"}}],"content":""},{"role":"tool","tool_call_id":"MpfiuoRaM","content":"Seattle, WA, USA"}],"tools":[{"type":"function","function":{"name":"get_location","description":"The get_location tool will return the users city, state or province and country.","parameters":{}}}]}
